Uses of Class
battleship.Ship

    • Uses of Ship in battleship

      Methods in battleship that return Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Ship ShipSetupFrame.getAircraftCarrier()
      Returns the frame's aircraft carrier.
      Ship ShipSetupFrame.getBattleShip()
      Returns the frame's battleship.
      Ship ShipSetupFrame.getCruiser()
      Returns the frame's cruiser.
      Ship ShipSetupFrame.getPatrolBoat()
      Returns the frame's patrol boat.
      Ship[] ShipSetupFrame.getPlayer1Ships()
      Returns player1Ships.
      Ship[] ShipSetupFrame.getPlayer2Ships()
      Returns player2Ships.
      Ship ShipSetupFrame.getSubmarine()
      Returns the frame's submarine.
      Methods in battleship with parameters of type Ship 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ShipSetupFrame.checkForShipOffGrid(Ship shipToSnap)
      Checks to see if the ship is off the grid, if so calls returnShipToStart to move ship back to starting position.
      void ShipSetupFrame.checkForShipOverLap(Ship shipToSnap)
      Checks to see if the ship overlaps another.
      void BattleShipTest.dragShipHorizontalTo(ShipSetupFrame frame, Ship shipToDrag, int locX, int locY)
      Method to simulate clicking, dragging, and releasing a ship horizontally.
      void BattleShipTest.dragShipVerticalTo(ShipSetupFrame frame, Ship shipToDrag, int locX, int locY)
      Method to simulate clicking, dragging, and releasing a ship vertically.
      void ShipSetupFrame.returnShipToStart(Ship shipToSnap)
      Moves the ship back to its starting location.
      void GameBoard.setPlayer1Ships(Ship[] ships)
      Sets player1Ships to an array of ships.
      void GameBoard.setPlayer2Ships(Ship[] ships)
      Sets player2Ships to an array of ships.
      void ShipSetupFrame.setValues(Ship shipToSet)
      sets the values of the ships in the 2D array.
      void ShipSetupFrame.snapShipToX(Ship shipToSnap)
      Moves the ship into the nearest column to avoid overlapping columns.
      void ShipSetupFrame.snapShipToY(Ship shipToSnap)
      Moves the ship into the nearest row to avoid overlapping rows.
